column4: hello, if I did a fresh install of edgy, and firefox tells me it can stall flash automatically. Is it going to install version 9?
& xtknight, when i right click on youtube flash video it states Flash Player 9, but I'm skeptical to believe its the latest
flashplayer 9 is the latest. Try it, see what happens, if it's not Flash Player 9 yuou can just install FP9 manually. It's very simple.
